hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
select t.id as id, t.name as name from AppApplication t where 1 = 1 and t.uuid not in(:excludeUuids) <if isNotBlank(systemUnitId)> and t.systemUnitId = :systemUnitId </if>
<if isNotBlank(name) || isNotBlank(code) || isNotBlank(id)> and (1 = 2 <if isNotBlank(name)> or lower(t.name) like '%${name?lower_case}%' </if> <if isNotBlank(code)> or lower(t.code) like '%${code?lower_case}%' </if> <if isNotBlank(id)> or lower(t.id) like '%${id?lower_case}%' </if> ) </if> order by code asc,name
select t.id as id, t.name as name from AppApplication t where t.id in (:appAppIds) order by code asc,name
